title: Haliru Alidu
text:
Haliru Alidu (born 24 February 1984) is a <a href="Togo">Togo</a>lese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> midfielder. He currently plays for <a href="AS%20Douanes%20%28Lom%C3%A9%29">AS Douanes</a>.
Alidu represented the <a href="Togo%20national%20football%20team">Togo national football team</a> in <a href="Egypt">Egypt</a> <a href="2006%20Africa%20Cup%20of%20Nations">2006 Africa Cup of Nations</a>.
